title: I keep getting disconnected from server in champion select
body: I logged into league and went to draft. when i found a match it wouldnt let me type and then it said i was disconnected from the servers. so i closed it waited about 20 minutes and it did the same thing. i gave it 10 more minutes and it still does the same thing. I dont know why this is happening or what to do and it is clearly not my computer or internet because 1. im typing this and posting it on the internet and 2. it was working fine lik

replies.body:
It is entirely possible that your connection to the internet is perfectly fine, but the connection to the PvP.net Servers is the problem we need to look at.  Given that this is happening consistently, something is blocking your computer from having a stable connection.  In an effort to get this resolved, make sure that you complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664). It has the most common solutions to get this fixed up.

Let me know if you are still experiencing issues!
